mapper.select: select P.p_no as p_no, P.cate_no as cate_no, P.s_no as s_no, P.p_group_buying as p_group_buying, P.p_follow_sale as p_follow_sale, P.p_name as p_name, P.p_detail as p_detail, P.p_group_price as p_group_price, P.p_sell_price as p_sell_price, P.p_follow_price as p_follow_price, P.p_stock as p_stock, P.p_regdate as p_regdate, P.p_status as p_status, P.p_hit as p_hit, C.cate_large as cate_large, C.cate_small as cate_small, PI.p_img as p_img, S.s_name as s_name from product P left outer join category C on P.cate_no = C.cate_no left outer join product_img PI on P.p_no = PI.p_no and PI.p_img_order=1 left outer join shop S on P.s_no = S.s_no where p.p_no=#{p_no}

select cate_small from product P left outer join category C on P.cate_no = C.cate_no
${search} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
subject like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
group by cate_small
mapper.update: update product set p_hit = p_hit+1 where p_no=#{p_no}
update product set p_status='5' where p_no=#{p_no}
